581:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kva punarbhagavan śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
581:4: evamanutpāde'nirodhe'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau|
581:7: subhūtirāha-kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām,
581:8: evamanutpāde'nirodhe'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām?
581:9: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi-kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām|
581:10: evamanutpāde'nirodhe'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāmiti?
581:11: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
581:17: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
581:18: api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā dharmībhavati vā?
581:20: bhagavānāha-takiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
581:23: bhagavānāha-tasmāttarhi subhūte evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ na tathatā kṣīyate ityevaṃ śikṣate|
581:24: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām|
581:31: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāmanuprāpsyati|
581:32: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyo māreṇa vā māraparṣadā vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhimarditum|
581:34: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyati|
581:35: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati|
581:36: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate nāthakarakeṣu dharmeṣu,
581:41: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate triparivartasya dvādaśākārasya dharmacakrasya pravartanāya|
581:42: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhātuṃ nonīkariṣyāmīti śikṣate|
581:43: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate|
581:44: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate|
581:45: neyaṃ subhūte udārā śikṣā śakyā hīnasattvena śikṣitum|
581:46: na hi alpasthāmnā śakyamasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitum|
581:53: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayeṣūpapadyate,
581:62: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāndho bhavati,
581:84: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati,
581:95: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate,
581:100: asti hi tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate|
581:101: tatpunaḥ subhūte upāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamat?
581:104: yathā anyenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate,
581:106: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
581:110: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā evaṃ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
581:111: tatkatamasya bhagavan dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
581:118: evaṃ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddheṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā asaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
581:120: evaṃ subhūte bālapṛthagjanā enān dharmānajānanto'paśyanto dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti,
581:122: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyāyacchante,
581:124: vayamevamapaśyakān sattvān paśyayiṣyāmaḥ ityatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante|
581:125: atra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā balānyanuprāpnuvanti,
581:128: evaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti|
581:130: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakāste mahāpṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ ye'pagatapāṣāṇāḥ,
581:131: yatra suvarṇaṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vā rajataṃ votpadyate|
581:134: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:136: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:138: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:140: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:142: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:145: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:147: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:149: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:151: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:153: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:155: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:157: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:159: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:161: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:163: tasmāttarhi subhūte alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
581:167: tebhyo'pi subhūte alpatarakebhyastathatvāya pratipadyamānebhyo'lpatamāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyante|
581:168: tebhyo'pi subhūte alpatamebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānebhyo'lpatamāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
581:170: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ya ete'lpatamebhyo'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
581:171: teṣu gaṇanāṃ gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
581:173: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
581:181: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
581:185: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatānyantargatāni bhavanti,
581:186: evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti|
581:187: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye pravartamāne sarvāṇīndriyāṇyantargatāni bhavanti,
581:188: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya sarvakuśalā dharmā antargatā bhavanti|
581:189: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti,
581:190: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ajñāne niruddhe sarve'kuśalā dharmā niruddhā bhavanti,
581:191: sarvāśca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti|
581:192: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam|
581:193: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate|
581:196: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ,
581:198: subhūtirāha-jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvadbhagavan bahavaḥ sattvā bhavanti,
581:199: kaḥ punarvādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ|
581:200: bhagavānāha-yaḥ subhūte eko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃstān sarvasattvān cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiścopatiṣṭhet,
581:201: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
581:204: bhagavānāha-ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
581:207: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā|
581:208: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmanuttaratāṃ gantukāmena sarvasattvānāmanāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmena buddhaviṣayamanuprāptukāmena buddhavṛṣabhitāmanugantukāmena buddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhasaṃpattimanuprāptukāmena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam|
581:209: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi,
581:211: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattirapi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati?
581:212: bhagavānāha-śrāvakasaṃpattirapi subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati|
581:213: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,
581:219: na ca prativahati-mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate|
581:220: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati|
581:221: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,
581:223: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati,
581:225: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'parihāṇadharmā aparihāṇadharmeti veditavyaḥ|
581:229: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati,
581:232: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte-iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
581:234: evamapi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte,
